data: SUS High Dose Fentanyl for Opioid Use Disorder
Prior to prescribing fentanyl for the treatment of Opioid Use Disorder, consider consult with site specific addiction service or provincial addiction RACE line.
Only providers who have satisfied their provincial college requirements can prescribe high dose fentaly for the treatment of opioid use disorder
Please assess the possible need for dose adjustment if patient has been off injectable opioid agonist treatment for greater than 24 hours
Alert patients' community pharmacy of hospitalization and consider discontinuation of community fentanyl prescription if ordering in hospital
Discontinue all previous hospital fentanyl orders prior to ordering high dose fentanyl
